title: First News
author: Team
content: Yo guys thanks for playing my site. I'll add more games soon along with my own creation "Phonky calculator" that will be available to play on my website (today or tomorow). I'm also thinking about implementing things like local chat where u can chat with your friends at school on the chromebooks and global chat, along with features like liking and disliking games.  Special thanks to Cumming and Huston for the most active users. I care about your feedback and opinions, feel free to email me chunblocked.contact@gmail.com Phonky Calculator is gonna be a banger tho
